attributes.action: Make unnecessary Pre-installed software like Bloatware(Adware&Trialware) illegal
attributes.additional_details:
When you buy a new Devise, you expect it to be fast as possible .
If that were only the case.The truth is, most slower than they should be, clogged with unnecessary preloaded software. Known as bloatware. watch this video the to find out more about it https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NOCbIPiX81c 

There is allot of other unnecessary Pre-installed software types see URL's below. 

https://bit.ly/2x8jLw4
https://bit.ly/2x8hvp7
https://bit.ly/2Of8pxz
https://bit.ly/2HDQ7GR
https://bit.ly/2Og35do
attributes.background: I have been a Computer technician for over 4 years .I myself and people I have helped have had this issues and it is becoming more popular on new devises .I believe we should get the best experience on new devises and making Bloat-ware,Adware and Trialware, illegal is the only way to fix it.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition asking the Government and Parliament to make it illegal to sell computers with pre-installed software without the customer's consent, if that's what you'd like to happen.
